alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 9:55PM MST until January 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches, with higher amounts over the Black Range. * WHERE...Portions of the Gila Highlands in Northern Grant and Western Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may become difficult along state highways 15, 35, and 152. Mountains passes may become impassable overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
